question: Which of the following was the architect of Communal Award?
explanation: The British Prime Minister Ramsay Macdonald announced the Communal Award on 16 August 1932 which granted separate electorates in British India for the Forward Caste, Lower Caste, Muslims, Buddhists, Sikhs, Indian Christians, Anglo-Indians, Europeans and Untouchables (then known as the Dalits), etc.
